attributes.action: Equality peace love for all humanity  Everyone should be equal worldwide
attributes.additional_details:
Problems at school ?
Problems with parenting ?
Homeless ?
Suicides and murders ??
Thefts, bullies, crimes .........
Domestic violence,marriage brakedowns ????
So many children depressed,stressed,under pressure from SCHOOLS AND PARENTS??? 
Who is to blame parents or someone ??? 
NO STRESS OF LIFE HAVE TO EARN  MONEY TO PAY BILLS THAT NEVER END. RICH POOR MIDDLE CLASS AND HOMELESS 
EVERYONE IS EQUAL SO WHY IS IT NOT HAPPENING........
attributes.background:
We are in world of control power all BY MONEY...
Where has equality and love gone if u want a better world of peace love everyone needs to stick together and remember who has a say if everyone was equal watch what would happen. Unity as one LOVE HOPE PEACE DIVERSITY
NO MORE SUFFERING FOR HUMANTY

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
